sections.heading: discrimination and practices; violations; penalties
sections.text: Any common carrier, shipper, or consignee who willfully violates any provision of section 75-126 shall be guilty of a Class I misdemeanor. Any officer, agent, or employee who, for or on behalf of any common carrier, shipper, or consignee, willfully

75-127.Unjust discrimination and practices; violations; penalties.

Any common carrier, shipper, or consignee who willfully violates any provision of section 75-126 shall be guilty of a Class I misdemeanor. Any officer, agent, or employee who, for or on behalf of any common carrier, shipper, or consignee, willfully violates any provision of section 75-126 shall be guilty of a Class II misdemeanor. Each day of violation shall constitute a separate offense.

SourceLaws 1963, c. 425, art. I, ยง 27, p. 1365;Laws 1971, LB 843, ยง 1;Laws 1977, LB 39, ยง 198;Laws 1994, LB 414, ยง 42.
